ValidationRule.description:
Created per Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-005028
This Validation Rule prevents users from changing the Type field after the record has been created.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT($Profile.Name = "NI Administrator"), NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), NOT($Profile.Name = "NI Support Managers"), NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(Type__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You may not change the Type on a CR once the record has been saved.
